SqlQueries.Dictionary: SELECT dct.Id ,dct.Name ,dct.Description ,dct.SqlExpression FROM TeamServices.vDictionary AS dct
SqlQueries.DictionaryInsert: INSERT INTO TeamServices.vDictionary (Name, Description, SqlExpression) Values (@Name, @Description, @SqlExpression)
SqlQueries.Files: SELECT fls.Id ,fls.Name ,fls.Description ,fls.FileName FROM TeamServices.vFiles AS fls
SqlQueries.Links: SELECT lnk.Id, lnk.Name, lnk.Url FROM TeamServices.Links AS lnk
SqlQueries.Projects: SELECT prj.Id, prj.Name, prj.Description, prj.LogoPath FROM TeamServices.Projects AS prj
SqlQueries.Quote: SELECT qts.id, qts.text, qts.author FROM TeamServices.vQuotes AS qts
SqlQueries.Users: SELECT usr.Id, usr.MachineName, usr.Name ,usr.Birthday ,usr.IpAddress FROM TeamServices.vUsers AS usr
SqlQueries.OvertimeWorkReports: SELECT owr.Name, owr.UserName, owr.OvertimeHour, owr.LoadDtm FROM TeamServices.vOvertimeWorkReport AS owr

NewSqlQueries.Name: Dictionary
NewSqlQueries.Query: SELECT dct.Id ,dct.Name ,dct.Description ,dct.SqlExpression FROM TeamServices.DictionaryView AS dct

NewSqlQueries.Name: DictionaryInsert
NewSqlQueries.Query: INSERT INTO TeamServices.Dictionary (Name, Description, SqlExpression) Values (@Name, @Description, @SqlExpression)

NewSqlQueries.Name: Files
NewSqlQueries.Query: SELECT fls.Id ,fls.Name ,fls.Description ,fls.FileName FROM TeamServices.FilesView AS fls

NewSqlQueries.Name: Links
NewSqlQueries.Query: SELECT lnk.Id, lnk.TypeId, lnk.Name, lnk.Url, lnk.IcoClass FROM TeamServices.LinksView AS lnk

NewSqlQueries.Name: Staff

NewSqlQueries.Name: WorkReports
NewSqlQueries.Query: SELECT rpt.Name, rpt.Description, rpt.UserName, rpt.TimeHour, rpt.LoadDtm FROM TeamServices.WorkReportView AS rpt

NewSqlQueries.Name: WorkReportsInsert
NewSqlQueries.Query: INSERT INTO TeamServices.WorkReport (Name, Description, UserName, TimeHour, LoadDtm) Values (@Name, @Description, @UserName, @TimeHour, @LoadDtm)
